Key: (Hmmm. Is he not over here either?)
Heeeeey, Tonomachiiiiii!
Where are you, Tonomachiiii!
Are you okaaaay?! If you're here, say something!

It's no use. I don't see him anywhere.
Seriously, where did he go?

Could he really have been spirited away?
No, like that would even happen. Besides,
Tonomachi made up the whole Tengu Cow thing...

T-There's no such thing as ghosts, anyway...
Even if there were, I'm not scared at—
Yikes!
(Huh? What? What was that?!)
Shido!
What?! R-Rinne? W-Why?

Y-Yep, it's me. I went to look for you, Shido, but
it looks like I ended up walking into a weird
place... haha...
I-I see... That was bad for my heart...

I heard someone walking... I followed the sound and
there you were. I'm glad I found you. It's dark.
It makes me feel lonely.
Y-Yeah, I'm glad you found me, too.
You look so pale. Are you okay?
No... just... you know. But I'm fine!
Really? Well, alright. What happened to Tonomachi-kun?
I haven't been able to find him...
I can help you out.
Huh? Don't you have to go back to the others?
If I did that, it would've just made my trip here pointless.
I see. You're right. Okay, let's look for him.
Right.
Okay, so... let's check out that area. I haven't looked there yet.
Alright.
Hey, Shido?
Hm?
We had fun at the pool today, didn't we?
Yeah, I really like going to the pool in the summertime.
Tohka-chan was so excited. It was really cute.

That's so her. I mean, It'd be weird if she wasn't
that excited. She just loves that sort of thing.
Hehe, you're right.
Hm? Something wrong?
No... it's nothing.
I'm glad the three of us went. It was really nice.

Yeah, I'm glad to have gone too. It was so much fun!
Although at first I thought that... I might be in the way.
You seem really happy.

Oh! Um... w-well, it's because it was my
first time going out to play somewhere with Tohka
and... It's been a while with you too, Shido...
N-Now that you mention it, it has been... Hahaha.
H-Hey, Rinne?
What is it, Shido?
Um... let's go out again sometime.
Yeah, me too... I want to go out with you, Shido...
Huh?
Oh, nothing! I want to go out with all of you again.
Yeah. But man, Tonomachi isn't around anywhere...
Yeah... I wonder where he went.
Looks like it's no good. Should we head back?

Yeah, we should. Kotori-chan and the others
are probably starting to worry.

Oh, you're finally back!
Onii-chan, what were you doing?

S-Sorry... I got a little lost on the way here,
isn't that right, Rinne?
Y-Yeah!
There's no point if the search party gets lost!
I'm sorry...
We're sorry, Kotori-chan!

Still, I wonder where Tonomachi is...
What is he even doing? Gah. That guy...
